title: refactor(http-server-connections): inline single-use connection_create_parser function
body:
## Summary

The connection_create_parser function is called only once (line 671) and is 14 lines long.

## Location
File: src/http/SocketHTTPServer-connections.c
Function: connection_create_parser
Lines: 627-641
Called at: connection_init_resources (line 671)

## Pattern
SINGLE_USE_INLINE (HIGH severity)
